ComicInfo.Summary:
It's the stinging bee versus the hungry spider, when Cammy gets up close and personal with Juri! But Juri's not the only deadly damsel on the scene. This issue opens with a battle between five ferocious female fighters, all with ties to Shadaloo! Plus in a special bonus story, Akuma learns that branding yourself as a demon means you may also be hunted as one!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Omar Dogan | 1 | B | Cover B Connecting Variant | Robert Porter | 2 | C | 1:10 Homage Cover C | Edwin Huang | 3 | *Notes:* The 1:10 Homage Cover C is a homage of the cover of Danger Girl #1.
